name: Incident Briefing
description: Provides the Incident Commander with basic information on the incident situation and resources allocated.

name: Incident Objectives
description: Defines objectives and strategy for each operational period.

name: Organization Assignment List
description: Shows the incident organization and supervisory assignments.

name: Assignment List
description: Outlines assignments for Divisions or Groups.

name: Incident Radio Communications Plan
description: Lists radio channels assigned to each operational function.

name: Medical Plan
description: Identifies medical aid locations, hospitals, and transportation.

name: Incident Organization Chart
description: Displays a visual picture of the incident organization.

name: Safety Message/Plan
description: Communicates safety messages or a site safety plan.

name: Incident Check-In List
description: Records arrival of personnel and equipment.

name: General Message
description: Used for sending messages and requests within the incident organization.

name: Operational Planning Worksheet
description: Used to develop the incident action plan with assigned resources.

name: Incident Action Plan Safety Analysis
description: Identifies hazards and controls for each operational period.

name: Support Vehicle/Equipment Inventory
description: Provides an inventory of all support vehicles and equipment.

name: Air Operations Summary
description: Summarizes information related to aircraft assignments.
